title: Home
aboutdescbig: Tedili Mermer Company in Türkiye We are ready to meet all your marble and natural stone needs and projects Everything related to natural marble and natural stone, including modern home tables, decorative pieces, sinks, and Turkish bath accessories We work with professional hands and artistic touches to make your home more beautiful and modern
me: Basil Al-Qassab, founder of the Arab Investors Forum, is an administrator and executive of many investment projects with successful partnerships with investors and businessmen. I have a series of international commercial companies in Turkey, America and the Emirates.

subject: subject
aboutdesc: The main aim of our company is to follow the developments in the world and in our country by being open to innovation and development in the sector, and to ensure that the products that have developed the production with modern production techniques most suitable for the Turkish and world markets, take the place they deserve in our country and in the world with an effective sales network and maintain this superiority.Our company considers the technology, investment, marketing, operation plans and policies and production budget programs that it adopts and implements in order to realize this main goal, as tools of this main goal.

seconeTitle: A driver who speaks Arabic or English, for private daily trips and tours in all tourist places Fast and smooth direct booking via WhatsApp. The car will be waiting for you according to the requested date and location Arranged tours to invest time in visiting the most beautiful tourist destinations, with the possibility of specifying trip stations as desired
